Question: A large aquarium with a volume of \(3693\) L initially contains water with \(19\) kg of dissolved salt. A brine solution with a salt concentration of \(0.08\) kg/L is pumped into the tank at a rate of \(9\) L/min. At the same time, the well-mixed solution in the tank is drained at an equal rate to maintain its volume constant. How many kilograms of salt are present in the tank after 3 minutes? Provide your answer to five significant figures.
